info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 28 at 1:13PM PDT until March 28 at 2:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... North central Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... Southeastern Lincoln County in south central Nevada... Northeastern Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 215 PM PDT/215 PM MST/. * At 112 PM PDT/112 PM MST/, a dust storm was 12 miles south of Bunkerville, or 14 miles east of Overton, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Public / Satellite. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel along Interstate 15 north of Las Vegas. * This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 in Arizona between mile markers 0 and 2, and between mile markers 4 and 6. Interstate 15 in Nevada between mile markers 85 and 120. Locations impacted include... Mesquite, Overton, Moapa Town, Beaver Dam, Moapa Valley, Valley Of Fire, Overton Beach, Bunkerville, Logandale and Carp. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
